result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

sent to JR 10-06-16

Defendant Sancho J Hernandez not in court. Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

3:06 p.m.  Atty Constable calls the case and states the appearances.
Cass Cousins makes statements on this case.
Atty Cousins would request that the current warrant continue.

BTC: 
Current warrant is continued.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sancho J Hernandez not in court.  Atty Renc appears on behalf of defendant.   David R. Knaapen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

2:21 p.m.  Court calls case.
Atty Knaapen states the appearances.

Atty Renc states that her client is incarcerated.
Atty Knaapen would request an adjourned so that Atty Renc and Atty Cousins can discuss this case.
Atty Renc would request this be adjourned until 08/22/16 or 10/03/16.


  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant does not appear.  Attorney Anne Renc in court. David R. Knaapen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Atty Renc indicates her client is in custody in Nevada.  Makes additional statements to the Court.  Asks to reschedule the initial appearance.  
Court will adjourn for 2 weeks.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Anne Renc in court. Cass W Cousins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Atty Cousins would request an adjournment.  Atty Renc stipulates.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
